titles.title: A bill to provide Federal Perkins Loan cancellation to fire fighters.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

bill.summary:
11/16/2007--Introduced.
Amends title IV (Student Assistance) of the Higher Education Act of 1965 to cancel the Perkins loans of full-time federal, state, and local fire fighters.
